turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey can i get a gingerbread Latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks on18511 North scottsdale rd

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could i get a grande size?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Most certainly? What milk did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What type of milk do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Almond,coconut,nonfat,whole,2% or soy milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: soy milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright and did you want whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes on the whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else sir?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How many calories is in my drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 330 based on your size milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thats perfect just enough.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else that i may assist you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thats all thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright your order will be ready for pickup in 10 minutes and will send a receipt via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course anything i could do to help.
